channel.title: Is there a way?
channel.description: Is there a way, anyway at all to compile scar script to a .EXE?

item.title: Is there a way?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

I always wondered why people didnt type WriteLn in the first place. Its easier to read and looks much better. And now you’re stuck capitalizing all that crap. lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a way?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:7, topic:14447”][quote author=The Prince of Randomness link=topic=21589.msg243615#msg243615 date=1158317867]
Nah, its hard.

this script is 4k lines long.
every time string is inserted into a WriteLn or sendkeys, its different.
scar := writeln(‘hi my name is ‘+name_string+’ yeah thats right’);
Pascal = WriteLn(‘hi my name is ‘,name_string,’ yeah thats right’);
[/quote]

Do a global replace of '+ with ', and make all the functions/procedures in the right case. I got into a habit of doing that because most compilers require the correct case in order to use the corresponding function/procedure.

You know what would be a nice program to write? A scar applet that would edit a .txt file where your pascal code is stored, open it up, and translate it into pascal! There is a nice idea. :D[/quote]
xD thats a good idea, and you could use your compare string thingy

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a way?
item.dc:creator: @The_Prince_of_Random The Prince of Randomness
item.description:
@The_Prince_of_Random wrote:

Nah, case is sweet with bloodshed dev- pascal.

I suppose. Ive also got to change every ReadLn(‘Hi’); with
WriteLn(‘hi’);
Readln(reply);

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a way?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

[quote=“The Prince of Randomness, post:5, topic:14447”]Nah, its hard.

this script is 4k lines long.
every time string is inserted into a WriteLn or sendkeys, its different.
scar := writeln(‘hi my name is ‘+name_string+’ yeah thats right’);
Pascal = WriteLn(‘hi my name is ‘,name_string,’ yeah thats right’);[/quote]

Do a global replace of '+ with ', and make all the functions/procedures in the right case. I got into a habit of doing that because most compilers require the correct case in order to use the corresponding function/procedure.

You know what would be a nice program to write? A scar applet that would edit a .txt file where your pascal code is stored, open it up, and translate it into pascal! There is a nice idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a way?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Nope.

I wonder why kait bothered to make the scar compiler. He should havejust made a pascal/delphi compiler or better yet, just handed us one lol. 1000s of more functions and easy to improve on.

Read full topic
